ticket.title: Evidence bundle export/import commands exercising RFC-0028 boundary validation + RFC-0029 receipt validation (local-only)

tickets.reason: Receipts must include required RFC-0028/0029 artifacts.
Import/export must validate broker-admitted policy bindings.

in_scope: Implement `apm2 fac bundle export <job_id>` producing envelope + blobs.
Implement `apm2 fac bundle import <path>` that fails closed unless `validate_channel_boundary(...)` passes and embedded economics receipts validate.
Use this tool as a forced integration harness to ensure RFC-0028 and RFC-0029 are exercised.

steps: Define manifest/envelope serialization; store under fac blobs or temp export dir.

criteria: Import refuses when boundary check invalid or policy binding mismatched.
Import refuses when economics receipts unverifiable.
